TextView.tools:text: Buendeal.com is a leading online retailer of products that inform, educate, and inspire. The Buendeal group also has stores in the Canada, Germany, France, Japan and United Kingdom. Because we exist on the Web, we have unlimited shelf space and can offer a selection of over 17 million titles including over 13 million Book titles and over 1 million music titles. Compare that to a typical physical world book superstore, which carries around 170,000 books, or a typical physical-world music superstore, which carries around 34,000 CDs
